detectors.description:
Reentrancy in NinjaToken.funding() ():
	External calls:
	- ! fundingAccount.call.value(msg.value)() ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] += msg.value * fundingExchangeRate ()
	StandardToken.balances () can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) ()
	- NinjaToken.buy(string) ()
	- NinjaToken.funding() ()
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) ()
	- StandardToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) ()

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balances[msg.sender] += msg.value * fundingExchangeRate]()
	[StandardToken.balances]() can be used in cross function reentrancies:

	- [NinjaToken.buy(string)]()
	- [NinjaToken.funding()]()
	- [StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256)]()
	- [StandardToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)]()

detectors.description:
NinjaToken.setFundingEnv(uint256,uint256,uint256) () should emit an event for: 
	- startBlock = _startBlock () 
	- blockDuration = _blockDuration () 
	- fundingExchangeRate = _fundingExchangeRate ()

NinjaToken.setPrice(uint256,bool) () should emit an event for: 
	- price = _price ()

detectors.description:
Low level call in NinjaToken.funding() ():
	- ! fundingAccount.call.value(msg.value)() ()

Low level call in NinjaToken.buy(string) ():
	- ! fundingAccount.call.value(msg.value)() ()
Parameter NinjaToken.buy(string)._commit () is not in mixedCase
Parameter NinjaToken.transfer(address,uint256)._to () is not in mixedCase
Parameter NinjaToken.setPrice(uint256,bool)._price () is not in mixedCase
Parameter StandardToken.balanceOf(address)._owner () is not in mixedCase
NinjaToken.version () is never used in NinjaToken ()
StandardToken.totalSupply () is never used in NinjaToken ()
NinjaToken.decimals () is never used in NinjaToken ()
NinjaToken.name () is never used in NinjaToken ()

buy(string) should be declared external:
	- NinjaToken.buy(string) ()
